function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in relative humidity due to operation of DBAF","Impact":"Potential for increased microbial growth and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of indoor humidity levels and use of dehumidifiers if necessary","Technologies":"Dehumidifiers, humidity sensors","People":"Occupants of the building","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Decrease in air quality due to sustained VOC emissions from furniture systems","Impact":"Risk of exposure to harmful VOCs and potential health effects","Mitigation":"Implementing better ventilation systems and using air purifiers to remove VOCs","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of the building","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Moisture generation from DBAF leading to increased relative humidity in dry winter climates","Impact":"Potential for mold growth and indoor air quality issues","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of DBAF to prevent moisture buildup","Technologies":"Regular maintenance schedule, moisture sensors","People":"Occupants of the building","Owner":"Building management"}]}
